p: Sample solution of 60 μL and 50 μL of 0.1 M PBS having pH 6.8 containing α-glucosidase solution of 0.2 U/ mL concentrations was put in 96-well plate and placed in an incubator for 20min at 37°C. To the aforementioned each 96-well plate, 50 μL of 5mM ρ-nitrophenyl-α- D-glucopyranoside (PNPG) solution in 0.1 M PBS having pH 6.8 was added and incubated again at 37°C for 20min. After incubation process, reaction was stopped by the addition of 160 mL of 0.2-M sodium carbonate into all wells of the plate. At 405nm, absorbance was recorded by microplate reader (Synergy HT, BioTek). Percent inhibition and IC 50 of samples were calculated by using the following formula: inhibition (%) = control – test / control × 100.
